contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} '''Hawthorne''' may refer to: {{TOCright}} ==Places== ;Canada *[[Hawthorne Village, Ontario]], a suburb of Milton, Ontario ;United States *[[Hawthorne (Prairieville, Alabama)]], a plantation house listed on the National Register of Historic Places in Hale County, Alabama *[[Hawthorne, California]] **[[Hawthorne Municipal Airport (California)]] in Hawthorne, California *[[Hawthorne, Florida]] *[[Hawthorne Township, White County, Illinois]] *[[Hawthorne, Louisville]], Kentucky *[[Hawthorne, Minneapolis]], Minnesota *[[Hawthorne, Nevada]] **[[Hawthorne Army Depot]] near Hawthorne, Nevada *[[Hawthorne, New Jersey]] *[[Hawthorne, New York]] *[[Hawthorne, Portland, Oregon]] *[[Hawthorne, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania]] *[[Hawthorne, Washington, D.C.]] *[[Hawthorne, Wisconsin]], a town *[[Hawthorne (community), Wisconsin]], an unincorporated community *[[Hawthorne Bridge]], Portland, Oregon *[[Hawthorne Race Course]] near Chicago, Illinois ;Australia *[[Hawthorne, Queensland]], a suburb of Brisbane ==Roads== *[[Hawthorne Avenue (Ottawa)]], a street in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada *[[Hawthorne Boulevard (disambiguation)]], multiple uses ==Other uses== *[[Hawthorne (surname)]] *[[Hawthorne (book)|''Hawthorne'' (book)]], by Henry James about Nathaniel Hawthorne's writings *[[Hawthorne, CA (album)|''Hawthorne, CA'' (album)]], a compilation album by The Beach Boys, released in 2001. *[[Hawthorne effect]], an industrial psychology phenomenon *[[Hawthorne Heights]], an American band *[[Hawthorne Works]], a huge Western Electric facility in Cicero, Illinois *[[Hawthorne (TV series)|''Hawthorne'' (TV series)]], a medical drama starring Jada Pinkett Smith *[[Hawthorne the Hermit Crab]], a fictional character in the comic strip ''Sherman's Lagoon'' ==See also== * [[Hawthorn (disambiguation)]]<!-- intentional disambiguation links must go through the "Foo (disambiguation)" redirect; this is policy, per [[WP:MOSDAB]] and [[WP:INTDABLINK]]; violation of this policy harms the encyclopedia by creating false positives in disambiguation reports, and will therefore be reverted as vandalism --> *[[Hawthorne House (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation|geo}}
